String.string: Meet Detrian on Pleasure Street in Castanica and deliver his recall orders.
Take the wooden pig doll to Detrian's little sister, Hennika.
Take the wooden pig doll to Detrian's little sister Hennika.
Take Hennika's Charm to Detrian at Avenger Outpost on the ground floor of the Hungry Caverns.
Take Hennika's Charm to Detrian at Avenger Outpost on the ground floor of the Hungry Caverns.
Go to Karina at Avenger Outpost on the ground floor.
Fight gula slavers and caiman mercenaries in the Hungry Caverns Vaults.
Report your success to Karina at Avenger Outpost.
